title: Churn rate of Spotify worldwide 2017 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Churn rate. In total the number of data points it has is 2.
Overall Churn rate has increased over the Year.
Churn rate is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Churn rate, of value 19.8 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Churn rate, of value 18.1 was reported at Year 2017
